name: py-mikado

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependencies.name: py-biopython
dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-drmaa
dependencies.description: Python wrapper around the C DRMAA library.

dependencies.name: py-intervaltree
dependencies.description: Editable interval tree data structure for Python 2 and 3.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-nose
dependencies.description:
nose extends the test loading and running features of unittest, making
it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyfaidx
dependencies.description: pyfaidx: efficient pythonic random access to fasta subsequences

dependencies.name: py-python-magic
dependencies.description:
A python wrapper for libmagic. This project is named python-magic but
imports as the module name "magic".

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-simplejson
dependencies.description: Simplejson is a simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python

dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy
dependencies.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy-utils
dependencies.description: Various utility functions and custom data types for SQLAlchemy.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-ujson
dependencies.description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: snakemake

Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
